title: Underground Resistance Bunker Adventure #46
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Communications Room
rooms.description: A cramped underground room lit by a single flickering bulb. Radio equipment lines one wall, crackling with static. Maps with red pins cover another wall. The air is damp and smells of earth and old paper. A metal desk sits in the corner, and supply crates are stacked near the entrance.

items.name: wooden supply crates
items.description: Several crates marked with resistance symbols

items.name: heavy wire cutters
items.description: Industrial wire cutters for cutting through fences or locks

items.name: resistance commander's desk
items.description: A battered metal desk with three locked drawers

items.name: classified mission briefing
items.description: A typed document marked 'TOP SECRET'
items.text: MISSION BRIEFING: Operation Liberation begins June 6, 1944. Commander Wolf leads the operation. Agent Eagle handles intelligence. Agent Fox manages supplies. The documents must be retrieved from the armory and delivered to the extraction point. Remember: only those who know the resistance survive.

items.name: security access card
items.description: A worn card with 'ARMORY ACCESS' stamped on it

items.name: tactical wall maps
items.description: Maps showing enemy positions and resistance safe houses
items.text: The maps show various locations marked: Safe House Alpha in the Forest Bunker, Enemy Headquarters in the City Center, and Extraction Point at the Northern Border.

items.name: resistance radio
items.description: An old radio set with a logbook beside it

items.name: radio communications log
items.description: A notebook with coded transmissions
items.text: Latest transmission: 'Eagle to Wolf - Documents secured in armory lockbox. Combination is the year of our greatest operation. Fox confirms extraction route clear. Remember who we are and where we hide.'

items.name: reinforced steel door
items.description: A heavy door with a card reader and warning signs

rooms.name: Resistance Armory
rooms.description: A concrete room with weapons racks along the walls. Rifles, ammunition boxes, and equipment are neatly organized. A large metal cabinet dominates one corner. Propaganda posters showing resistance symbols cover the walls. A locked gate leads to the escape tunnel.

items.name: weapons rack
items.description: A rack holding various resistance weapons and tools

items.name: heavy bolt cutters
items.description: Large bolt cutters capable of cutting through chains and locks

items.name: resistance propaganda posters
items.description: Posters showing the resistance symbol and slogans
items.text: The posters read: 'FREEDOM OR DEATH' and 'THE RESISTANCE NEVER SURRENDERS'. One poster shows three leaders: Commander Wolf, Agent Eagle, and Agent Fox, with the caption 'Our leaders hide in the Forest Bunker, planning our liberation.'

items.name: secure metal cabinet
items.description: A tall cabinet with a combination lock and multiple compartments

items.name: resistance personnel file
items.description: A folder containing information about resistance members
items.text: PERSONNEL FILE: Commander Wolf - Leader of resistance operations. Agent Eagle - Intelligence officer. Agent Fox - Supply coordinator. All members are part of the Underground Resistance fighting for freedom.

items.name: classified resistance documents
items.description: The critical documents needed for the mission - intelligence reports and operational plans

items.name: escape tunnel map
items.description: A hand-drawn map showing the tunnel route
items.text: ESCAPE ROUTE: The tunnel leads to the Northern Border extraction point. Security checkpoint requires verification: Who leads us? Where do we hide? What are we called?

items.name: stacked ammunition boxes
items.description: Boxes of ammunition and supplies

items.name: escape tunnel gate
items.description: A locked gate with a security panel. Three verification questions are displayed on a screen.

password_questions.question: Who leads the resistance?
password_questions.hint: Check the mission briefing and personnel files

password_questions.question: Where does the resistance hide?
password_questions.hint: Look at the maps and posters for safe house locations

password_questions.question: What are we called?
password_questions.hint: The personnel file mentions the organization's name

rooms.name: Extraction Point
rooms.description: You emerge from the tunnel into a moonlit forest clearing. A resistance truck waits with its engine running. Fellow resistance members wave you forward. The classified documents are secure, and the mission is complete. Freedom lies ahead!

items.name: resistance transport truck
items.description: A camouflaged truck ready to take you to safety

items.name: fellow resistance fighters
items.description: Your comrades in the fight for freedom, waiting to help you escape

rooms.win_message: SUCCESS! You have retrieved the classified documents and escaped the bunker. The resistance truck speeds away into the night, carrying you and the vital intelligence to safety. The mission is complete, and the fight for freedom continues. You win!
